intro.title: What is Copy Trading?
intro.description: Copy trading allows you to automatically replicate the trades of experienced traders. It's an ideal way for beginners to access professional trading strategies while learning from experts.
intro.feature1_desc: Follow verified traders with proven track records
intro.feature2_desc: Earn returns while experienced traders manage the strategy
intro.feature3_desc: You decide how much to invest and can stop anytime
intro.diversification_desc: Never invest all your capital in a single strategy. Spread your investment across multiple traders to reduce risk.

evaluation.title: How to Evaluate a Strategy
evaluation.description: Learn what the key metrics mean to make informed investment decisions.
evaluation.profit_factor_desc: Ratio of gross profit to gross loss. Higher is better.
evaluation.win_rate_desc: Percentage of profitable trades. Consistency matters.
evaluation.max_drawdown_desc: Largest peak-to-trough decline. Lower is safer.
evaluation.monthly_return_desc: Average monthly profit. Balance risk vs reward.

step1.title: Tell us about your experience
step1.advanced_desc: Experienced investor with knowledge of markets

step2.title: How much do you want to invest?
step2.description: Enter the total amount you want to allocate to copy trading. We'll help you distribute it optimally.
step2.low_amount_warning: With this amount, your options may be limited. Consider investing at least $500 for better diversification.

step3.title: Confirm your risk profile
step3.description: Based on your answers, we recommend the following profile:
step3.conservative_desc: Lower risk strategies with stable, predictable returns. Ideal for capital preservation.
step3.moderate_desc: Balanced approach mixing stable and growth strategies. Good risk-reward ratio.
step3.aggressive_desc: Higher risk strategies with potential for greater returns. Requires higher risk tolerance.

step4.title: How to fund your wallet
step4.description: Follow these steps to deposit funds into your Exness investment wallet:
step4.app_step1: Download the 'Exness Copy Trading' app and log in
step4.app_step3: Select 'Deposit' and choose a payment method
step4.app_step4: Enter the amount (minimum $10 USD) and confirm
step4.web_step4: Select payment method and enter amount
step4.web_step6: Funds will appear instantly in your wallet

funding.title: How to Fund Your Wallet
funding.description: You can fund your investment wallet from the Copy Trading app or Personal Area web. Here's how:
funding.min_deposit: Minimum deposit is $10 USD. Funds appear instantly.

option1.title: From Mobile App (Faster)
option1.description: Recommended for quick deposits on the go.
option1.step1: Download and install 'Exness Copy Trading' app (iOS/Android) and log in
option1.step4: Choose a payment method from the list
option1.step5: Enter amount (minimum $10 USD) and follow on-screen instructions

option2.title: From Web Platform (More Complete)
option2.step1: Log in to your Personal Area at www.exness.com or my.exness.com
option2.step2: Navigate to Copy Trading (or Social Trading) tab
option2.step4: In the 'Investment wallet' card, click Deposit
option2.step5: Select payment method, enter amount and choose your investment account

risk_warning.title: Risk warning:
risk_warning.description: Copy trading involves risk of loss. Past results do not guarantee future returns. Always set appropriate risk limits for your capital.

disclaimer.title: Important about Copy Trading
disclaimer.point_1: • Copy trading does not require direct access to your trading account
disclaimer.point_2: • Signals are provided for you to execute manually
disclaimer.point_3: • Tálamo never trades directly in your account
disclaimer.point_4: • You maintain full control over your trades at all times
disclaimer.point_5: • Results shown are simulations based on historical data
